column1: It was founded in 1710 as the sloboda of Sukholozhskaya. In 1847
column2: coal deposits were prospected in the vicinity
column3: and the village served as a coal mining center until the 1860s. Urban-type settlement status was granted to Sukhoy Log in 1932 and town status in 1943.

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Sukhoy Log serves as the administrative center of Sukholozhsky District. As an administrative division
column3: it is incorporated within Sukholozhsky District as the Town of Sukhoy Log. As a municipal division
column4: the town of Sukhoy Log is
column5: together with all twenty-five rural localities in Sukholozhsky District
column6: incorporated as Sukhoy Log Urban Okrug.
